sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de biǎoyǎn fēicháng chūsè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Sa performance est exceptionnelle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His performance is outstanding.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā xiàng yínháng shēnqǐng le dàikuǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a demandé un prêt à la banque.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He applied for a loan from the bank.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī gè dānchún de nǚhái.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une fille simple et innocente.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is a simple and innocent girl.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Píláo jiàshǐ dǎozhì le shìgù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La conduite en état de fatigue a provoqué l'accident.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Fatigue driving caused the accident.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Háizi yào xuéhuì dúlì shēnghuó.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les enfants doivent apprendre à vivre de manière indépendante.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Children should learn to live independently.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 青春是人生最美好的时光。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qīngchūn shì rénshēng zuì měihǎo de shíguāng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La jeunesse est le plus beau moment de la vie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Youth is the most beautiful time of life.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège qíngjǐng ràng wǒ hěn gǎndòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette scène m'a beaucoup ému.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This scene moved me very much.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Mùcái zhèngzài ránshāo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le bois est en train de brûler.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The wood is burning.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì gè lǎoshi rén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une personne honnête.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is an honest person.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 她是一个热心的志愿者。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī gè rèxīn de zhìyuànzhě.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une bénévole enthousiaste.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is an enthusiastic volunteer.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qíyú de rén dōu zǒu le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les autres sont tous partis.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The rest of the people have left.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 如今生活比以前好多了。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Rújīn shēnghuó bǐ yǐqián hǎo duō le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Aujourd'hui, la vie est bien meilleure qu'avant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Life nowadays is much better than before.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们要培养孩子的兴趣。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yào péiyǎng háizi de xìngqù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons cultiver les intérêts des enfants.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We should cultivate children's interests.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de shēntǐ bǐjiào ruò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Son corps est assez faible.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His body is rather weak.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shànyú yǔ rén gōutōng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est doué pour communiquer avec les autres.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is good at communicating with people.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī gè shànliáng de rén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une personne gentille.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is a kind person.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我没有现金，可以刷卡吗？
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ méiyǒu xiànjīn, kěyǐ shuākǎ ma?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je n'ai pas d'argent liquide, puis-je payer par carte ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I don't have cash, can I pay by card?

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他被调动到另一个部门。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā bèi diàodòng dào lìng yī gè bùmén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a été muté dans un autre département.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He was transferred to another department.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shuāngfāng de guāndiǎn duìlì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les points de vue des deux parties sont opposés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The views of both parties are opposing.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì wǒ de bǎobèi nǚ'ér.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est ma fille chérie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is my precious daughter.
